channel.title: Prefab Pod on XC Mobile House
channel.description: Recent content in Prefab Pod on XC Mobile House

item.title: 360° Panoramic Bubble Hotel Star Room | Transparent Dome Glamping Pod Manufacturer in China
item.description:
360° Panoramic Bubble Hotel Star Room – Transparent Dome for Glamping & Resorts

Modular Transparent Structure · UV-Proof Polycarbonate · Easy to Install · Factory Direct Supply

Our 360° panoramic bubble hotel star room is a transparent modular dome structure designed for eco-resorts, luxury glamping, boutique homestays, and event use. Constructed with aviation-grade aluminum and UV-resistant polycarbonate, this dome provides an immersive stargazing experience while offering safety, comfort, and portability.
